Absolutely brilliant torrent with easy to follow instructions. if you can sort out a USB device (which was a bitch for me), then your sorted. BONE, your a savior to cheapskates everywhere :D theres just two things that needs to be changed
1:you MUST use a 2GB hard drive since 512mb is already used to make it usable
2:you MUST be connected to Xbox Live. couldn't get it to work otherwise
3: Placing a demo is not optional

apart from that, great instructions
